p: Due to the current lack of effective and safe drugs, natural products presented in this review may form part of the health beliefs, self-medication choices, and self-efficacy practices that people may use to manage COVID-19. Natural products presented in this paper form a repertoire of promising leads that may be repurposed into novel drugs, nutraceuticals, and supplements for COVID-19. If there is a long-term remedy for COVID-19, it must lie in Mother Natureâ€™s pharmacy of SARS-CoV-2 inhibitors and immunomodulators from plants, fungi, and marine organisms.
